name: MySouthernGrandma
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my southern grandma
des:
My Southern Grandma offers a glimpse back in time when Grandma was one of the solid foundations that our community was based on.

Grandma was tough! Definitely saucy! But, we all knew beneath that crusty exterior was a heart of Gold and mounds of wisdom. 

My Southern Grandma offers the nostalgia of hearing that sweet old lady offer you stern words of advice to get you through your day.
